code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const URLInput=_ref=>{let{onAnalyze,loading}=_ref;const[url,setUrl]=useState('');const[options,setOptions]=useState({waitTime:5000,timeout:30000,fullPageScreenshot:true});const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(url&&!loading&&isValidURL(url)){onAnalyze(url,options);}};const isValidURL=string=>{try{new URL(string);return true;}catch(_){return false;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:url,onChange:e=>setUrl(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter website URL (e.g., https://example.com)",className:"input-primary flex-1",disabled:loading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn-primary whitespace-nowrap px-8 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed",disabled:loading||!isValidURL(url),children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-4 h-4 border-2 border-white border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Analyzing..."})]}):'Analyze SEO'})]}),!isValidURL(url)&&url&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-lg p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-2 text-red-700",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Please enter a valid URL (include http:// or https://)"})]})})]})});};export default URLInput;
